description.value: The Character gains +10 bonus to any tests that specifically involve the specific sense. For example, Heightened Senses (Sight) would apply to awareness Tests to spot someone out a crowd, but not to shoot them as this requires more than eyesight. Talent can be taken multiple times, each time for a different sense: Sight, Sound, Smell, Taste, Touch.
